questions: _   takes Mary to school every day.
article:
Mary is an English girl. She's six years old . Her mother takes her to school in the morning and brings her home in the afternoon. She likes her nice school. She likes her teachers, too.
One day, she says   to her mother, " Mom, we have a new girl in our class today, Her name is Kim. She's six years old , too. She's very nice, but she isn't English. She is German ".
"Does she speak   English "?
"No, but she laughs  in English ", Mary says happily  .
